# indexType

**Instance Property**

The data type of indices in the index buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var indexType: MTLIndexType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The index type needs to be [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLIndexType/uint16] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLIndexType/uint32]. The default is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLIndexType/uint32].

## Configuring index data

- **indexBuffer**: A buffer that contains indices for the vertices that compose the triangle list.
- **indexBufferOffset**: The offset, in bytes, to the first index in the buffer.
